original_text: But when Pharaoh saw that there was a respite, he hardened his heart and would not listen to them, as the Lord had said.
korean_text: 그러나 바로가 숨을 쉴 수 있게 됨을 보았을 때에 그의 마음을 완강하게 하여 그들의 말을 듣지 아니하였으니 여호와께서 말씀하신 것과 같더라

sentences.original_text: But when Pharaoh saw that there was a respite
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 바로가 잠시 쉴 틈이 생긴 것을 보고

sentences.original_text: and would not listen to them
